pr_title: SQL: refactor In predicate moving it to QL project

timeline.message:
Move In, InPipe and InProcessor out of SQL to the common QL project.
Move tests classes to the QL project.
Create SQL dedicated In class to handle SQL specific data types.
Update SQL classes to use the InPipe and InProcessor QL classes.
Extract common Foldables methods in QL project.

timeline.bodyText:
I would remove this from ql since it's a trappy class. It uses DataTypeConverter which is QL specific and SQL would end up using that instead of SqlDataTypeConverter.
That is, Foldables is really reusable because of that and as such, I would just inline the methods.
timeline.author: costin

timeline.message:
Be more explicit when folding and converting a foldable value, by
removing most of the code inside Foldables class.
